Portal 2 é uma obra de arte, sem dúvidas. Uma leve evolução gráfica e de mecânicas do primeiro jogo, mas com certeza é uma experiência única. Se você quer um puzzle game com uma história excelente esse é o jogo pra você.

игра тупа для сверхразумов .после того прошел, получил нобеля

Portal 2 is a great sequel to the first game. I think it's even better than the original. You can play with a friend and go through co-op levels or just do it on your own! If you find yourself bored you can always try to beat your friend's times in different levels and try community levels as well. Even though the game is old, it's still a great game!

Одна из лучших игр Valve .
,

,

,
,
,
,
Для задания на гран при стим

The Verdict

The original Portal benefitted from its brevity. It had a concise story paired with inventive first-person puzzle mechanics that challenged you to be creative while pulling the trigger. Portal 2 makes the original look like the prototype it was. It's filled with a larger cast of characters vividly brought to life through brilliant writing and some of the best voice acting in video games. Its puzzles are challenging without being unreasonable, and, once you're finished with the single-player mode, one of the best co-operative experiences on the market awaits. Valve cuts no corners and finds ways to make you care about everything from the major characters to the cubes used to solve puzzles. From the beginning of the single-player story to the end of the co-op mode, Portal 2 is a novel, unforgettable experience.

довольно хорошая игра для того чтобы сыграть с другом и не только

Simplesmente o melhor jogo de puzles que já joguei. A dificuldade vai subindo gradativamente e novas mecânicas vão sendo adicionadas durante todo o jogo pra que não fique repetitivo nem enjoativo. Dá pra zerar em uma tarde se vc se esforcar.

Antagligen Valves bästa fullfjädrade Tripple AAA spel. det första är med tajt med storyn men kvaliten på tvåan slår allt.
Det här är den enda 3an jag vill ha från valve

This was an instant favourite when I first played it and is still my favourite puzzle game several years on. It takes the brilliant concept from the original Portal and expands on the story, gameplay and excellent level design. Since the story is linear replayability isn't great (although it's long enough that you probably won't remember all the solutions straight away), however there are decent community made mods and often great new workshop content that offer many more hours of gameplay. There are also a few hidden "secrets" you might miss on a single playthrough if you don't explore thoroughly. I particularly liked the [spoiler]singing turrets[/spoiler]!

This is one of the best games ever made. The plot is enthralling, the gameplay is fun and mind-bending, and with the nearly infinite custom workshop levels, it is incredibly replayable. There's a lot of reasons that this series is considered a classic. 10/10

If you've played Portal (or not), love puzzle games and have a sense of humour, you already know this is the game for you. If you haven't tried this game before... it's about time you do because the story is great.
